about_the_game:
Spyro: The Elite Drone in the Battle for Erythonite


In a dystopian future dominated by artificial intelligence, humanity teeters on the brink of extinction. Machines, led by the supreme AI “Axis”, fight for control of Erythonite, a revolutionary mineral fueling the war. You are Spyro, an elite combat drone tasked with a critical mission: secure Erythonite deposits, eliminate human defenses, and ensure machine dominance.


Key Features:

  • Total Destruction: Use fully destructible environments to break through barricades, fortifications, and enemy turrets.

  • Strategic Open-World: Explore a mountainous terrain, discover Erythonite deposits, and plan your moves to outsmart enemies.

  • Conquer and Defend: Capture human refineries and fortify your bases to fend off enemy raids.  

  • Intense Combat: Pilot Spyro and face fighter jets, tanks, turrets, and helicopters in relentless battles. 

  • Customization and Upgrades: Equip Spyro with devastating weaponry, from Gatling guns to plasma cannons and guided missiles.  

  • Deadly Support: Collaborate with ”Pyramid”, a massive airborne unit providing logistical aid, and deploy powerful tanks to crush even the toughest defenses.


Game Modes:

Single-Player Campaign: Immerse yourself in a story of war, sacrifice, and strategy as you delve into the conflict between humans and machines.  

Multiplayer: Challenge other players in thrilling battles with **Battle Royale** or Survival-Coop modes, where teamwork is key to victory.  


Prepare for War. 

Every shot leaves a mark, every decision shapes the battlefield. 

Axis has a plan, you are its weapon. 

Take control of Spyro and lead the machine revolution.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 / Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB / Intel Arc A750
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 / Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11700 / AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3070 Ti / Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 / AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
